title: Google\Cloud\Dlp\V2\TableOptions
name: TableOptions
description:
Instructions regarding the table content being inspected.

Generated from protobuf message google.privacy.dlp.v2.TableOptions

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.identifying_fields
params.description: The columns that are the primary keys for table objects included in ContentItem. A copy of this cell's value will stored alongside alongside each finding so that the finding can be traced to the specific row it came from. No more than 3 may be provided.
